Title: The Shining
Description: A family heads to an isolated hotel for the winter where a sinister presence influences the father into violence, while his psychic son sees horrific forebodings from both past and future.

Genre.Name: Horror
Genre.Description: A horror film is one that seeks to elicit fear or disgust in its audience for entertainment purposes. Horror films additionally aim to evoke viewers' nightmares, revulsions and terror of the unknown or the macabre. Horror may also overlap with the fantasy, supernatural fiction, and thriller genres.

Director.Name: Stanley Kubrick
Director.Bio: Stanley Kubrick was an American film director, producer, screenwriter, and photographer.

Title: The Others
Description: A woman who lives in her darkened old family house with her two photosensitive children becomes convinced that the home is haunted.

Genre.Name: Horror
Genre.Description: A horror film is one that seeks to elicit fear or disgust in its audience for entertainment purposes. Horror films additionally aim to evoke viewers' nightmares, revulsions and terror of the unknown or the macabre. Horror may also overlap with the fantasy, supernatural fiction, and thriller genres.

Director.Name: Alejandro Amenabar
Director.Bio: Alejandro Fernando Amenábar Cantos is a Spanish-Chilean film director, screenwriter and composer.

Title: Shaun of the Dead
Description: The uneventful, aimless lives of a London electronics salesman and his layabout roommate are disrupted by the zombie apocalypse.

Genre.Name: Comedy Horror
Genre.Description: Comedy horror, also known as horror comedy, is a literary, television, and film genre that combines elements of comedy and horror fiction.

Director.Name: Edgar Wright
Director.Bio: Edgar Howard Wright (born 18 April 1974) is an English filmmaker. He is known for his fast-paced and kinetic, satirical genre films, which feature extensive utilisation of expressive popular music, Steadicam tracking shots, dolly zooms and a signature editing style that includes transitions, whip pans and wipes.

Title: The Exorcist
Description: When a 12-year-old girl is possessed by a mysterious entity, her mother seeks the help of two priests to save her.

Genre.Name: Horror
Genre.Description: A horror film is one that seeks to elicit fear or disgust in its audience for entertainment purposes. Horror films additionally aim to evoke viewers' nightmares, revulsions and terror of the unknown or the macabre. Horror may also overlap with the fantasy, supernatural fiction, and thriller genres.

Director.Name: William Friedkin
Director.Bio: William Friedkin is an American film and television director, producer and screenwriter closely identified with the New Hollywood movement of the 1970s.

Title: The Mist
Description: A freak storm unleashes a species of bloodthirsty creatures on a small town, where a small band of citizens hole up in a supermarket and fight for their lives.

Genre.Name: Horror
Genre.Description: A horror film is one that seeks to elicit fear or disgust in its audience for entertainment purposes. Horror films additionally aim to evoke viewers' nightmares, revulsions and terror of the unknown or the macabre. Horror may also overlap with the fantasy, supernatural fiction, and thriller genres.

Director.Name: Frank Darabont
Director.Bio: Frank Árpád Darabont is an American film director, screenwriter and producer.

Title: Let the Right One In
Description: The film tells the story of a bullied 12-year-old boy who develops a friendship with a strange child in Blackeberg, a suburb of Stockholm, in the early 1980s.

Genre.Name: Horror
Genre.Description: A horror film is one that seeks to elicit fear or disgust in its audience for entertainment purposes. Horror films additionally aim to evoke viewers' nightmares, revulsions and terror of the unknown or the macabre. Horror may also overlap with the fantasy, supernatural fiction, and thriller genres.

Director.Name: Tomas Alfredson
Director.Bio: Hans Christian Tomas Alfredson is a Swedish film director who is best known internationally for directing the 2008 vampire film Let the Right One In and 2011 espionage film Tinker Tailor Soldier Spy.

Title: Sweeney Todd: The Demon Barber of Fleet Street
Description: The legendary tale of a barber who returns from wrongful imprisonment to 1840s London, bent on revenge for the rape and death of his wife, and resumes his trade while forming a sinister partnership with his fellow tenant, Mrs. Lovett.

Genre.Name: Horror
Genre.Description: A horror film is one that seeks to elicit fear or disgust in its audience for entertainment purposes. Horror films additionally aim to evoke viewers' nightmares, revulsions and terror of the unknown or the macabre. Horror may also overlap with the fantasy, supernatural fiction, and thriller genres.

Director.Name: Tim Burton
Director.Bio: Timothy Walter Burton is an American film director, producer, writer and artist.

Title: The Birds
Description: A wealthy San Francisco socialite pursues a potential boyfriend to a small Northern California town that slowly takes a turn for the bizarre when birds of all kinds suddenly begin to attack people.

Genre.Name: Horror
Genre.Description: A horror film is one that seeks to elicit fear or disgust in its audience for entertainment purposes. Horror films additionally aim to evoke viewers' nightmares, revulsions and terror of the unknown or the macabre. Horror may also overlap with the fantasy, supernatural fiction, and thriller genres.

Director.Name: Alfred Hitchcock
Director.Bio: Sir Alfred Joseph Hitchcock KBE was an English filmmaker who was one of the most influential figures in the history of cinema.

Title: Hannibal
Description: Living in exile, Dr. Hannibal Lecter tries to reconnect with now disgraced F.B.I. Agent Clarice Starling, and finds himself a target for revenge from a powerful victim.

Genre.Name: Thriller
Genre.Description: Thriller film, also known as suspense film or suspense thriller, is a broad film genre that involves excitement and suspense in the audience.

Director.Name: Ridley Scott
Director.Bio: Sir Ridley Scott (born 30 November 1937) is an English film director and producer.

Title: Alien
Description: After a space merchant vessel receives an unknown transmission as a distress call, one of the crew is attacked by a mysterious life form and they soon realize that its life cycle has merely begun.

Genre.Name: Sci-Fi Horror
Genre.Description: Science fiction horror films are a subgenre of science fiction and horror films, often revolving around subjects that include but are not limited to alien invasions, mad scientists, and/or experiments gone wrong.

Director.Name: Ridley Scott
Director.Bio: Sir Ridley Scott (born 30 November 1937) is an English film director and producer.
